subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Nick Faldo, who won at Muirfield in 1987 and 1992, said Rory McIlroy, who also shot 79 on Thursday, should “just keep it minimal” and not squander his window for excellence.
snippet: Nick Faldo, who won at Muirfield in 1987 and 1992, said Rory McIlroy, who also shot 79 on Thursday, should “just keep it minimal” and not squander his window for excellence.
